original_text: And saying, Where is the promise of his coming? for since the fathers fell asleep, all things continue as they were from the beginning of the creation.
korean_text: 이르되 주께서 강림하신다는 약속이 어디 있느냐 조상들이 잔 후로부터 만물이 처음 창조될 때와 같이 그냥 있다 하니

sentences.original_text: Where is the promise of his coming?
for since the fathers fell asleep,
all things continue as they were
from the beginning of the creation.
